name: Tandoori Chicken Masala Recipe | Zubaida Tariq | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Tandoori Chicken Masala Recipe: Chicken ½ kg Lemons 3 Roasted Cumin Powder 1 tsp Crushed Red Chili 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 1 tbsp Tandoori Masala 2 tbsp Oil as required Salt to taste
instructions: Wash chicken and keep it in the bowl. Add in lemon juice, roasted cumin, red chili flakes, 1 tbsp ginger garlic Paste, 2 tbsp tandoori Masala and some salt. Keep it for ½ an hour.3. Put them in BBQ sticks and grill it. Tandoori Chicken Masala by Zubaida Tariq is ready to serve.
